attributes.action: Call a Referendum on the revised European Treaty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new treaty is substantially the same as the previous constitutional treaty on which the Labour Party promised the people of the United Kingdom a referendum.
According to the Irish and Spanish governments this new treaty is at least 95% of the original Constitution.
There are 240 identical proposals.
Our Government are on a ten week recess,they do not return until the 8th of October,and the European Council meets on the 17th of October, this leaves no time for parliamentry discussion on the new treaty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
